extDesc.message: Looks, acts & feels like you're using Facebook on your iPhone. Notifies you when new messages arrive!

m0.message: The new Facepad version $1 has been installed successfully!

m2.message: Notify me if I have unread messages

m5.message: Automatically check for unread messages at regular intervals

s2.message:
You have $1 unread messages!
Click here to view your inbox.

w1.message: The Fast and Easy way to interact with Facebook!

w13.message: For any questions, suggestions or feedback please feel free to

w2.message: Thanks for using Facepad extension for Chrome!

w3.message: There's not a lot more to say about. All you need is a login to Facebook as usual and the Facepad will work for you, even if you navigate away or close the Facebook tab.

w4.message: The Facepad checks your Facebook inbox at the interval that you specified and displays the total number unread messages with a little badge on the toolbar button (Pic.1)

w5.message: You can also enable notifications, and a fade-in window brings the unread email counts to your desktop (Pic.3) Set an alert sound that notifies you if you have unread messages in your Inbox.

w6.message: By clicking on Facepad button in your Chrome toolbar you can access all of Facebook's functionality in a small window that looks like Facebook on an iPhone (Pic.2)
